amendatorysection.para: In applying and construing the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act, consideration shall be given to the need to provide uniformity of the law with respect to the subject matter of the act among states that enact it.

annotation.para: The general purpose of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act, according to an express provision in this section, is to make uniform the law with respect to the model act among states enacting it. Groseth v. Groseth, 257 Neb. 525, 600 N.W.2d 159 (1999).
